summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Thursday 30 December to end of Thursday 30 December GMT
description: Overcast on Thursday and likely to remain dry. <br/><br/>Air mass back trajectories indicate  relatively clean air arriving from the south Atlantic. Very mild temperatures with a fresh south-westerly breeze. Good dispersion locally and minimal import of pollution is forecast. <br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates. <br/><br/>With best wishes for the festive period from Imperial ERG.
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
